actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend the adoption incentive payments program to incentive payments for foster child exits to reunification, adoption, and guardianship, and for other purposes.
short_title: Investing in Permanency for Youth in Foster Care Act

titles.title: Investing in Permanency for Youth in Foster Care Act

To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend the adoption incentive payments program to incentive payments for foster child exits to reunification, adoption, and guardianship, and for other purposes.
